description: Juicy cherries, gooey chocolate and crunchy biscuits, this black forest tiffin slice ticks all the boxes. Make it ahead for an afternoon snack or dessert.
name: Black Forest Cherry Tiffin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve reserved cherries. Combine dark chocolate and oil in a bowl. Pour dark chocolate mixture over slice, spreading to cover, then scatter with reserved biscuit mixture, white chocolate and halved cherries. Refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight, if time permits, until firm. Cut into squares to serve.
